dc:title: In Memory of Ed Hillock
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Discusses his articles and the effect the C.W. had on him. Gives a list of his accomplishments, particulars the founding of Integrity. Describes the long Buffering before his death and comments on the theology of suffering.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 111 1961-02-24 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
